item.title: Sourcing Hiring Demand - Data Collection
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Build a data collection and analysis system to identify hiring trends and demands across multiple job platforms, providing insights into market needs and skill requirements.
